Metric-Dimension Compatibility

Typically, MarketMover BIQ combines many different kinds of metrics into a single table. When this is the case, it is possible that not all of the attributes can be combined with every metric in a sensible way. For example, your configuration might have a metric called EMAIL OPEN RATE which is a measurement of campaign success. There would be a set of attributes that are compatible with this metric, such as MARKETING CAMPAIGN, CUSTOMER, and so on. However, trying to create a report that breaks out EMAIL OPEN RATE by product may not make sense (i.e. your company may not capture information in that way).

There should be an accompanying document that explains how your data repositories have been configured to explain which metrics and attributes are compatible with one another, as well as a data dictionary that explains what each column means.
